brick_017.title: Sanctum Branching Paths Logic
brick_017.description: Defines user flow logic through Sanctum via symbolic paths (Moon, Tree, Flame, Tide). Includes triggers for forked outcomes, energy-based rerouting, and ‘Rule of Three’ integration.

brick_018.title: Moonlit Market Event Engine
brick_018.description: Core framework for rotating Moonlit Market events. Includes randomized stall spawns, NPCs, item rarity rotation, lunar-cycle effects, and stall-specific triggers.

brick_019.title: Constellation Mapping & Lore Stars
brick_019.description: Star-mapping system linked to user progress. Unlocks constellations, each representing a lesson, spell, or NPC memory. Includes Seraphine’s ‘Sky Thread’ mechanic.
